author: Haley Champion
text:
I received my dress is a very timely manner and in perfect condition. 

However, the photo online made it look more of a midcalf length dress and when I put it on it grazes the top of my ankles. I'm 5'5" and traditionally a size 4, so for this to be the case was a little surprising to me. Due to the layers on the dress it doesn't make sense financially to have it altered. It's also final sale so now I have a dress that doesn't work :(
title: Dress wasn't modeled accurately

text: This was the worst purchase I have ever made. I understand the merchandise is used but my packaging was beyond awful. If I’m spending over a thousand dollars with your company I expect it not to look like someone threw the LV bag in a 99 cent Real Real microfiber bag. I felt like I bought something off of eBay and was shocked. I will never purchase a used item from this company again became the whole experience felt discarded and like I was getting someone’s hand me downs thrown into a bag for thousands of dollars.
title: This was the worst purchase I have ever…

author: Susan CALNE
text:
I bought a ‘ final sale’ Bottega’ woven purse. The photographs and the description were acceptable and flaws mostly able to be  cleaned up, polished etc.
When it arrived one of the woven strips of leather was cut right through close to a side seam. When I enlarged the photo part of it was visible.
Where is the phone number? Chat line Agent  didn’t understand my problem ‘ final sale’ final sale’ . I asked to be transferred to someone senior. That took even longer with someone who appeared to be reading from a script and needed to be reminded of Customer Service.  Make sure there are enough detailed photos.Enlarge them all; don’t rely on the ‘expert’The ‘expert’ who ‘curated’ this piece provided a less than accurate description’. I have returned it with tracking. It remains to be seen whether this postage is refunded. It should be for an item not as described.
title: Not as described Final sale Returned with hard work!

author: Amanda
text: I ordered a handbag which was final sale only (which so many of their items are). I felt like the color was wildly misrepresented. Both on my phone and computer screen, it looked like a beautiful soft pink, the purse I received was neon pink. The description of the purse was "pink" I guess they left a lot of room for interpretation. I don't understand why they couldn't just disclose "hot pink". This definitely made me lose trust so I don't know if I would buy from them again.
title: Color Inaccuracy

author: Richie Sater
text: This company quoted us for a fur coat at over 1000 dollar sell price then proceeded to change the price and sell it for only 300 without telling us.  They took a 50% commission on top of that.  When asked about how they could do this they mentioned some hidden term in the contract.  Do not trust and do not consign.
title: Do Not Consign, VERY DISHONEST COMPANY!

author: customer
text:
Ordered a size Large as indicated on the item as well as invoice, however the jacket that came was an Xtra Small.  
First time customer too and unfortunately will not be returning.
title: Ordered a size Large as indicated on…

author: Christa
text: The shoes I ordered were at least one to two sizes smaller than what it says on the shoes, which means they run way small (no mention on site) and I had to pay for shipping twice. They also were more worn than they look online. I received a return label and amount of store credit and sent the package off in time. The website now states order not returnable... so I'm left wondering if I get at least some of my money back?
title: No mention this brand runs way small and more worn than advertised

author: Jacques
text: Seamless delivery and perfect fit. For non-US deliveries however, why aren’t the duties not being billed immediately at the purchase? This makes returns virtually impossible and may refrain me from buying anything else on TRR despite the overall excellent experience otherwise.
title: Purchase & delivery top - import duty billing is a problem though
